post.text: I agree, Michael Moore- To all Americans, I see you & I hear you. I am your voice. Vote to #DrainTheSwamp with me on 11/8!

comment.author: Logan
comment.text: I have never liked Michael Moore before today. Always thought he was a left wing, blow hard and out of touch. My apologies Mr. Moore.

replies.author: Shelby
replies.text: He is...if you listen to the rest of the film...he's for killary.

replies.author: Logan
replies.text: Shelby oh I know that but it's the first time I've ever been able to get past the first 3 words out of his mouth. ðŸ™„
